name: Epic Labyrinth
description:
Plunge into the world of unsolved mystery, which takes your breath away, you have to go through a fascinating maze with a lot of jokes and enemies in the form of surprise,

where you need to jump at the right time at the right time to jump to the next island! You will need a very good reaction and ingenuity unusual thinking. 0 Checkpoints only 1 attempt died, start again, challenge yourself and get to the end and find out what's at the end. Remember you need to choose the right way to survive! This platformer will make you sweat come first to the treasure that fate has prepared for you !
